text: The Battle of Palma is an ongoing battle over control of the city of Palma in Mozambique, between the Mozambique Defence Armed Forces, other Mozambican security forces and private military companies, and Islamist terrorists reportedly associated with the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL). ==References== Category:2021 crimes in Africa Category:2020s murders in Africa Category:April 2021 events Palma Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Africa Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2020s Category:March 2021 events Category:Mass murder in 2021 Category:Massacres in Africa Category:Mozambique Category:Terrorist incidents in 2021 Category:Terrorist incidents in Africa in the 2020s
title: Battle of Palma
